attributes.action: scrap or seriously reduce the tax on recycled bio-fuel e.g used chip fat
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present you must pay tax on creating your own bio fuel.This tax is stopping people from taking advantage of this free power by pushing up the price to almost fossil fuel levels.This must stop.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
